markings:
Felicia Marsh Collection stamp, in red on lower right corner (bottom and right edges going off sheet): [F. Marsh Collection/Cat.#____ ] 
Estate number, written in pencil within stamp: [WC 30-4]
Verso: estate number and loan number in pencil, by different hands, in lower right corner.
provenance: The artist, New York (until d. 1955); Felicia Meyer Marsh, New York (1955-d. 1978; her estate, 1978-82; given to MIA).
title: Reclining Nude by the Sea
